name_jp: ドキドキニャンニャン
description_jp: 次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のアピールの20%増加
description_en: Voltage gained from next SP Skill increases by 20% of own Appeal.

effect.display: Gain 20% of Appeal as extra Voltage on next SP skill
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of Appeal as extra Voltage on next SP skill
